question_text: Which of the following statements about embedded systems are true? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They often lack traditional OS interfaces
They require frequent OS updates and user logins
They are designed for general-purpose computing
They may include proprietary firmware with limited user configurability
They often operate independently once powered and configured
correct_answer: They often lack traditional OS interfaces
They may include proprietary firmware with limited user configurability
They often operate independently once powered and configured
explanation: Embedded systems are self-contained, purpose-built, and usually not administered like general-purpose OS devices.
